description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget named BirthdayCard, which displays a birthday's details in a styled card layout. It includes UI elements like icons, text, and handling of birthday data passed via a Birthday object.

classes.name: BirthdayCard
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays birthday information in a styled card, including name, age, and optional reminder icon.

methods.name: BirthdayCard
methods.description: Constructor for BirthdayCard, requiring a Birthday object and optional key.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the birthday card, displaying person name, formatted date, next age, and a reminder icon if applicable.
